title: Hero Glamour with OBD2B update launched at Rs 86,698
description: The Hero Glamour has been updated to comply with the OBD2B norms. After this update, the prices start at Rs 86,698, an increase of Rs 2,000. Hero Glamour is available in two variants: Drum and Disc The 124.7cc engine’s output is unchanged at 10.5hp and 10.4Nm Hero Glamour now meets OBD2B norms It is available in two variants and four colour options Hero had earlier updated its hardy 100cc engine that serves in the Passion Plus and Splendor Plus. Now, the brand is steadily updating its 125cc commuter range to comply with the OBD2B norms that came into effect on April 1, 2025.  The Glamour continues to be powered by the same 124.7cc single-cylinder air-cooled engine whose output is unchanged at 10.5hp and 10.4Nm. This mill comes mated to a 4-speed gearbox. Currently, the bike is offered in two variants: Drum (Rs 86,698) and Disc (Rs 90,698). Along with the emission-related update, Hero has also increased the prices of these variants by Rs 2,000.  The Hero Glamour comes in four colours – black with silver, red with black, black with blue and black with red. However, the black with red paint scheme is only offered with the Drum variant. Also see: Hero Super Splendor Xtec OBD2B update priced from Rs 88,128

html:
Due to the upgrades to meet emission norms, Hero has also increased the Glamour’s prices by Rs 2,000.

The Hero Glamour has been updated to comply with the OBD2B norms. After this update, the prices start at Rs 86,698, an increase of Rs 2,000.

  1. Hero Glamour is available in two variants: Drum and Disc
  2. The 124.7cc engine’s output is unchanged at 10.5hp and 10.4Nm

Hero Glamour now meets OBD2B norms

It is available in two variants and four colour options

Hero had earlier updated its hardy 100cc engine that serves in the Passion Plus and Splendor Plus. Now, the brand is steadily updating its 125cc commuter range to comply with the OBD2B norms that came into effect on April 1, 2025. 

The Glamour continues to be powered by the same 124.7cc single-cylinder air-cooled engine whose output is unchanged at 10.5hp and 10.4Nm. This mill comes mated to a 4-speed gearbox.

Currently, the bike is offered in two variants: Drum (Rs 86,698) and Disc (Rs 90,698). Along with the emission-related update, Hero has also increased the prices of these variants by Rs 2,000. 

The Hero Glamour comes in four colours – black with silver, red with black, black with blue and black with red. However, the black with red paint scheme is only offered with the Drum variant.

Hero Super Splendor Xtec OBD2B update priced from Rs 88,128
